entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.6°C

Observed at: Kingston Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

Temperature: 3.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
